title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, October 3, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Emily Post (1873), who said, "Manners are a sensitive awareness of the feelings of others. If you have that awareness, you have good manners."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Emily Post (1873), who said, "Manners are a sensitive awareness of the feelings of others. If you have that awareness, you have good manners."
